content: –ë–æ—Ç — –∑–¥–µ—Å—å –º—ã –ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏–º –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–Ω—ã–π AIRDROP NFT , –≤ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º –í—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—è—Ç—å —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ!

ddGroup.title: NFT METAHUNTERS –•–û–†–û–®–ê–Ø –ò–ù–í–ï–°–¢–ò–¶–ò–Ø?
content: PRE-SALE. –ü–æ–∫—É–ø–∞—è NFT –Ω–∞ PRE-SALE 1 –∏ 2, –≤—ã –±–µ—Ä–µ—Ç–µ –µ–µ –ø–æ —Å–∞–º–æ–π –Ω–∏–∑–∫–æ–π —Ü–µ–Ω–µ, –∞ —Ç–µ, –∫—Ç–æ –∫—É–ø–∏—Ç NFT –Ω–∞ PUBLIC —Å–µ–π–ª–µ — –∫—É–ø—è—Ç –µ–µ –¥–æ—Ä–æ–∂–µ. –°–æ–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –≤—ã —É–∂–µ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç–µ –æ–±–ª–∞–¥–∞–µ—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º.

–ù–∞—Ä–∞—â–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∞—É–¥–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏. –° –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–º –¥–Ω–µ–º –Ω–∞—Å —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è –≤—Å–µ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ –∏ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ, –∂–µ–ª–∞—é—â–∏—Ö —Å–º–∏–Ω—Ç–∏—Ç—å NFT –æ—Ç Meta Hunters —Å—Ç—Ä–µ–º–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ —Ä–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ç. –ú—ã –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –¥–µ–Ω—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ–º –Ω–∞–¥ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ–º –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞. –ü–æ—Å–ª–µ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞ –Ω–∞—à–µ–π web3 Hunters World –∏–≥—Ä—ã –∏—Ö —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–µ—Ç –µ—â–µ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ, –Ω–æ NFT –æ–Ω–∏ —Å–º–æ–≥—É—Ç –∫—É–ø–∏—Ç—å —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –Ω–∞ –≤—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—á–Ω–æ–º —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–µ, –≥–¥–µ —Ü–µ–Ω—É

en.title: The Collection of 4999 unique NFT‚Äôs on the TON blockchain together with the artist Occultra
en.description: Meta Hunters will open access to Web3 game Hunters World, NFT, Staking and other bonuses! 4999 unique NFT Metahunters on the TON blockchain will allow you to gain an advantage in the web 3.0 game ¬´Hunters World¬ª, develop faster and earn more tokens. Moreover you can stake as many of our NFTs as you want for even greater benefits!

header.title: the collection of 4999 unique NFTs on the TON blockchain
header.subtitle: together with the artist Occultra
header.text: Have time to get early access to the pre-sale stage, which will take place in July 2022, and take part in an unforgettable journey into the world of Web3 together with the Meta Hunters team!

sWelcome.title: WELCOME TO METAHUNTERS
sWelcome.subtitle: METAHUNTERS WILL OPEN ACCESS TO WEB3 GAME HUNTERS WORLD, NFT STAKING AND OTHER BONUSES!
sWelcome.text: 4999 unique NFT Metahunters on the TON blockchain will allow you to gain an advantage in the web 3.0 game «Hunters World», develop faster and earn more tokens. Moreover you can stake as many of our NFTs as you want for even greater benefits!
sWelcome.subText: The collection was created in collaboration with street art artist Occulta, known for collaborations with brands such as Reebok, G-Shock, Levis, DC and many others.

sRoadMap.title: road map
sRoadMap.subtitle: come on an adventure with us

sTeam.title: team
sTeam.subTitle: a good community and an experienced team are the key to a successful project

sTeamItems.itemText: Mihail Metahunters — Creative Director, responsible for the concept of the game. He manages the entire creative process, having 12 years of experience in design and more than 2 years in NFT.
Danil Metahunters — A real crypto enthusiast, responsible for all internal processes and the team itself, having 3 years of experience as CEO and several successful projects behind.
Occultra is the street art artist in charge of the visuals and complete rendering of the collection. Worked with such big brands as Reebok, G-Shock, Levi’s, DC and etc.

Kirill Metahunters is a marketing manager who has worked on crypto projects and NFTs with many CIS and European stars. Remember Buzcoin? So, he has nothing to do with it Kirill assures you that Metahunters is doomed to success because this is his most interesting and promising project for a long time in a while.

Vladimir Metahunters — community manager. He is responsible for developing ideas concerning promoting and creating a strong community. Vladimir has worked with many large NFT projects on the Ethereum and Solana blockchains, and also created content for well-known brands. He will tell you which NFT to buy, recently he has been talking about Metahunters.

ddGroup.title: WHAT IS NFT METAHUNTERS?
content: MetaHunters is a collection of 4999 unique NFTs based on the increasingly popular TON blockchain.

NFT from the MetaHunters collection will provide access to the exciting web 3.0 game «Hunters World» and will give an advantage over other players together with the opportunity to receive bonuses from NFT staking.

An Ocultura artist has hand-painted a huge amount of external attributes to ensure that each of the 4999 NFTs is unique. But the differences will not only be visual, internal characteristics will differ as well, including:

— Rarity — from simple to LEGENDARY characters!
— Faction— 4 different factions we will tell you about soon!
— Weapons and magic — which will help you defeat other players in the game!
— Skills and bonuses — will give you an advantage over other characters!

ddGroup.title: HOW CAN I BUY NFT METAHUNTERS?
content: The sale of our NFT Metahunters will take place in several stages:

WHITELIST — Closed sale only for the earliest and most active members of the community. Lowest NFT Price!
PRESALE1 — First sale is for community members (price is higher than for WHITELIST)
PRESALE2 — The second sale is for community members (the price is higher than in PRESALE1).
PUBLIC SALE — Public sale is for everyone (the price is higher than in PRESALE2).

ddGroup.title: WHAT WALLETS CAN I USE TO PURCHASE NFT?
content: To buy NFT and store TON, we recommend you downloading:

— wallet TonKeeper
— TonWallet IOS Wallet / –∫–æ—à–µ–ª–µ–∫ TonWallet Android

ddGroup.title: WHERE CAN I BUY TON?
content:
— On crypto exchanges: FTX (requires identity verification), OKX (only email and phone need to be verified to work)
— Telegram bot for purchase: CryptoBot or Wallet (purchase by the card is available, but a phone number is required)
— On the BestChange website, in one of the exchangers.

ddGroup.title: WHAT CAN I DO WITH NFT METAHUNTERS AFTER PURCHASE?
content: Shortly after the completion of the NFT mint, we will launch the STAKING NFT to receive bonuses. The more NFTs, the more rewards will be given out in staking!

But the most interesting thing will start after the launch of the web 3.0 game «Hunter’s World» — in the game you will get a character that will be completely identical to your NFT. You will develop faster and earn more tokens than regular players.

ddGroup.title: HOW CAN I JOIN THE METAHUNTERS COMMUNITY?
content: Telegram channel (in russian/ in english) — all the most important announcements and contests are here!
Telegram chat (in russian/ in english) — we communicate, make friends and discuss the project! And every week we raffle 100 TON.
Twitter — well, what is an NFT-collection without twitter?!
Bot — here we make a large-scale NFT AIRDROP, in which you can take part!

ddGroup.title: IS NFT METAHUNTERS A GOOD INVESTMENT?
content: Here are four reasons why you should buy NFTs from our collection:
PRE-SALE. When buying NFT at PRE-SALE 1 and 2, you get it at the lowest price, and those who buy NFT at PUBLIC sale will buy it at a higher price. Accordingly, you will already have an advantage.

After finishing the mint, we will start STAKING. What is staking? NFT staking is a new way to generate passive income in the world of cryptocurrencies. It allows NFT holders to lock assets on DeFi platforms and earn rewards without having to sell their NFT collections. This is the same as a deposit at interest in a bank or dividends from company shares.

Increasing audience. Every day there are more and more of us who want to mint NFT from MetaHunters. We are developing the project every day. After the launch of our web 3.0 «Hunters World» game, there will be even more members, but they will be able to buy NFTs only on the secondary market, where YOU set the price! They will have no other choice but to buy NFT at a price that you set!

sGallery.title: Hunters World is about to be launched!
sGallery.text: The team is working on gameplay, skill development system, reputation and resource collecting in a new and exciting format. Check out our community, Facebook and Telegram for the further information.

footer.title: join our community
footer.subtitle: Discover a successful financial future with Meta Hunters
